title: Sourcing Manager - Cab Interior
description:
We are looking for a Sourcing Manager within Project Procurement Cab Interior who is ready to be a part of the team that will shape the future of the driver’s work environment in a technological, commercial and international environment.
   

  

 Do you have a strong commercial mindset paired with an aptitude for engineering and are motivated by strengthening cooperation, driving strategic sourcing cases on components that affects the everyday life of the truck driver? Then your search is over!
   

  

**Who We Are**
 The Cab Interior Project Procurement team is working with the components in the driver environment. Seats, steering wheel, instrument panel, beds, storage, lights, climate system, noise absorbents, textile fabrics, etc – all of which contributes to Scania’s premium position in the truck business.
   

  

 We are a diverse team with origin from three continents and a broad competence spectrum and the level of internal cooperation is high. And we have fun at work!
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 In this role as a Sourcing Manager you will be responsible for steering wheel, seats, windows and beds. The current sourcing manager is going on maternity leave in June. It is segments with high volume value, complex design and it will require strategic, interpersonal, technical and commercial competence in this role.
   

  

 Scania is a brand within the Traton Group together with MAN, International and VW Truck & Bus and we are in the process of developing a common truck platform and you will be a key person as Project Lead Buyer in the work with steering wheels, seats and windows and the cooperation between the brands, aligning the strategies cross-functionally and within the Traton Group capturing synergies across the brands ensuring the right product balance between technology, quality, delivery, cost and sustainability.
   

  

 You will also be responsible for building and maintaining relationships with suppliers and continuously manage potentials and risks within the supplier base. You will also work in close collaboration with our cross-functions, such as R&D, production, logistics and sales & marketing.
   

  

 As sourcing manager you will also be a role model within the Cab Procurement organisation and will be expected to support your junior colleagues and contribute to the commercial strategy work within the 3-ring and X-ring.
   

  

**Your profile**
 You are a person with great commercial and technical interest and a passion for doing business. You have a good ability to develop a broad network and can work both within and outside processes in order to achieve better results. You want to further develop within organization politics, project work in order to navigate through this taking different stake holders’ opinions into account while securing progress.
   

  

 You are self-driven and can motivate yourself with persistence over time. You act with integrity and professionalism and are motivated by interacting with different levels of the organization and adapting the communication appropriately. In addition, you have analytical skills, like complex situations and are well organized.
   

  

 We expect you to have an academic degree in engineering, business or similar . We also expect you to have a few years of experience from procurement, with proven record of successful sourcings and negotiations and to be able to work both independently and within the team.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 We offer an interesting and challenging job within a great team. Our corporate culture is characterised by openness, diversity and respect for the individual. For the right person who takes responsibility for their own development, Scania offers many opportunities to grow and develop in your career both in Sweden and internationally.
   

  

**Questions?**
 Please contact:
   

  

 Karl Rejnö, Head of Project Procurement Cab Interior, +46 8 553 899 42, karl.rejno@scania.com
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV, a cover letter and copies of any relevant certificates and references.
   

  

 Selection and interviews will be held continuously from 7th of January and the position can be filled before last application date.
   

  

 Please apply through our website HR Inline/Job search at Scania as soon as possible and no later than 12th of January 2025.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!

title: SAP SuccessFactors Data Management Specialist
description:
* Flexible work locations in Sweden or Lisbon Portugal\*\*


 Scania is undergoing a transformation from being a leading supplier of trucks, buses, and engines to providing complete and sustainable transport solutions. Together with TRATON and our sister brands MAN, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International, we are working to shape the future of mobility with innovative and environmentally conscious solutions. Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do. Together, we are at the forefront of creating a sustainable future.
   

  

 Role Summary
   

  

 Scania Group is seeking an experienced, hands-on SAP SuccessFactors data management specialist to ensure the highest quality of HR data within our global system landscape, including the full SuccessFactors suite.
   

  

 The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in managing HR data governance, quality, and availability within a large, multinational organization. This operational role requires full responsibility for ensuring data quality control, governance, and continuous improvement within our HR systems, particularly SAP SuccessFactors.
   

  

 As a technically skilled expert, you will be passionate about operational excellence and data integrity. The role demands someone who thrives in a hands-on, detail-oriented environment and takes pride in promoting best practices and leading by example across the organization.
   

  

 As a hands-on SAP SuccessFactors data management specialist, you will play a critical role in ensuring the integrity and quality of HR data within a large, global organization. You will have the opportunity to lead improvements, drive data-driven decision-making, and promote best practices across the organization.
   

  

**Responsibilities** 
  

  

  

* Data Quality Control:
+ Take ownership of HR data quality across global HR systems, particularly SAP SuccessFactors, ensuring data is accurate, complete, and up-to-date.
+ Continuously monitor, validate, and correct data to maintain integrity and accuracy.

* SAP SuccessFactors Expertise:
+ Leverage deep knowledge of SAP SuccessFactors (full suite) to manage, troubleshoot, and improve data quality across the global system landscape.
+ Act as a technical expert to ensure global data accuracy, reliability, and seamless operation.

* Data Governance:
+ Enforce data governance practices to ensure compliance with internal standards, policies, and global regulations.
+ Lead the creation and maintenance of comprehensive data catalogues and documentation, ensuring clear communication of data governance principles across the organization.

* Training & Education:
+ Develop and deliver training programs to educate HR teams and business stakeholders on data handling practices, ensuring consistency, security, and alignment with Scania’s wider goals.

* Project Management:
+ Lead HR data-related projects to improve data availability and governance, ensuring timely and successful execution.
+ Collaborate with global teams to implement data improvements, track milestones, and drive data-driven decisions.

* Analysis & Reporting:
+ Use data analysis tools to proactively identify data inconsistencies and opportunities for improvement.
+ Produce regular data quality reports for global stakeholders and engage teams in following data governance best practices.

* Stakeholder Collaboration:
+ Work closely with HR, IT, and other business units within TRATON Group to understand data requirements, resolve data issues, and ensure high-quality data availability across the organization.

* Continuous Improvement:
+ Regularly review and refine working practices to drive improvements in data collection, governance, quality control, and reporting.


**Qualifications** 
  

  

  

* Proven Experience:
+ 5+ years of hands-on experience managing global HR data in SAP SuccessFactors within a large multinational organization.

* SAP SuccessFactors Expertise:
+ In-depth knowledge and hands-on operational experience with SAP SuccessFactors, particularly Employee Central.
+ SAP SuccessFactors certification in Employee Central, SAP Analytics Cloud, or Reporting and Analytics is strongly preferred.

* Data Management Expertise:
+ Proven track record in taking personal responsibility for HR data quality in global systems.
+ Experience in creating and maintaining data catalogues and utilizing data validation tools.

* Backlog Management:
+ Experience managing and executing service request backlogs effectively.

* Project Management Skills:
+ Strong project management capabilities, with experience leading cross-functional teams on HR data initiatives.
+ Proficiency in using project management tools to track progress and outcomes.

* Analytical Mindset:
+ Data-driven and analytical, with a passion for investigating and improving data quality.
+ Skilled in identifying trends and issues to drive actionable improvements.

* Detail-Oriented:
+ Excellent attention to detail and a hands-on approach to ensuring data integrity across all HR systems.

* Technical Leadership:
+ Ability to lead technical discussions and act as the subject matter expert in global working groups focused on HR data within SAP SuccessFactors.


 Who You Are
   

  

  

* Strong problem-solving skills, with the ability to take full ownership of data quality and governance.
* Ability to balance operational work with long-term improvement projects.
* A proactive, hands-on specialist who collaborates well with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Passion for data management and a continuous improvement mindset.
* Opportunity to coach and develop others within the team and across the organization.


 Application
   

  

 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.
   

  

 Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-01-31. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

 If you have questions or would like more information about the role, please contact hiring manager Yolandi Menton, yolandi.menton@scania.com
   

  

**We look forward to your application!**

title: SAP EWM Specialist - Battery Production
description:
Scania is undergoing a transformation from being a leading supplier of trucks, buses, and engines to providing complete and sustainable transport solutions. Together with TRATON and our sister brands MAN, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International, we are working to shape the future of mobility with innovative and environmentally conscious solutions. Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do. Together, we are at the forefront of creating a sustainable future.
   

  

**Role Summary**
 The automotive industry is accelerating rapidly towards electrification, and we are ramping up electric vehicle production to advance Scania’s sustainability efforts. We are building a new battery factory is equipped with fully automated production and logistics equipment. In parallel we are implementing SAP to support logistics, finance, and material planning, expected to be completed in the coming months. As our new SAP EWM specialist, you will take charge of maintaining the existing SAP implementation, provide user support, and driving projects and initiatives. The role offers opportunities for cross-functional collaboration, making it ideal for a service-minded individual with knowledge in SAP, MES, SCADA, and PLC systems.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
* Lead the SAP improvement initiatives for logistics and production
* Train and support end-users tailoring guidance to specific teams, and ensuring they maximise SAP’s potential.
* Act as the go-to coordinator for resolving disruptions, managing change request, and escalating complex issues to Scania IT.
* Conduct user acceptance testing (UAT) and other evaluations, delivering accurate results within deadlines.
* Translate deviations and improvement ideas into actionable functional specification in JIRA and prioritise from a business perspective.
* Lead pulse meetings to keep stakeholders aligned.


**Who You Are**
 To thrive in this role, we believe that you are a person who enjoy taking responsibility, and who dares to challenge. Communicative and collaborative, you focus on opportunities instead of problems and are driven to find solutions together with others.
   

  

 You have a relevant educational or professional background along with experience in SAP EWM/WM. Please include details of your SAP EWM/WM experience in your resume, specifying your responsibilities and the duration of your work. Additionally, please also highlight the amount of experience you have in IT landscape in a manufacturing environment.
   

  

 You are fluent in Swedish and English, both spoken and written, and are comfortable using Office 365. But most importantly, you bring the drive, enthusiasm and willingness to grow—both personally and with your colleagues and the business.
   

  

**This Is Us**
 At Scania, we are a community dedicated to sustainable transport solutions. Our Battery Production unit is leading the way with high-volume production of battery packs, modules, and cabling for e-mobility products. We work collaboratively across departments like logistics, production, and engineering, fostering a culture of continuous learning and development.
   

  

 Our new battery factory features cutting-edge technology and fully automated equipment. Our SAP warehousing team ensures our systems are efficient and reliable. We value innovation, open communication, and proactive problem-solving.
   

  

**Scania Offers**
 We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including Scania Sergel and Midway hubs. With a structured development plan and courses, Scania supports your career growth both locally and internationally.
   

  

 Benefits include training at our health center Gröndal or wellness allowance, result bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. Scania also hosts events for employees and their families, and Stockholm residents enjoy direct access to Södertälje via Scania Job express buses.
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.
   

  

 Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-01-05. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

 If you have questions or would like more information, please contact: IT Business Manager MELS, tony.gustavsson@scania.com.
   

  

**We look forward to your application!**

title: Sourcing Manager for Project Purchasing Hoses & Rubber
description:
Scania is now undergoing a transformation from being a supplier of trucks, buses, and engines to a supplier of complete and sustainable transport solutions.
   

  

 Are you passionate about business, with a knack for technology and engineering? Are you a go-getter who exercises initiative and thrives in a positive environment? If so, we want you on our team. We are seeking an enthusiastic, goal-driven individual to fill the position of a Sourcing Manager.
   

  

**Overview Of The Position**
 We are specialized in the procurement of all hoses within development projects of the whole TRATON group. You will support the team of project purchasers with various tasks, such as sending requests for quotations, negotiating, placing orders, sending PPAP requests, and managing product changes. This enables you to be at the forefront of all ongoing projects and innovations that will form our future – sustainable transport solutions.
   

  

**Why Join Our Team?**
* Positive and Open-minded Culture


 We believe in fostering a positive and open-minded culture within our organization. This doesn't only create a pleasant working environment, but it also promotes creativity, encourages problem-solving, and drives innovation. Being part of our team means you'll be valued and respected for your unique perspective and contributions. We understand that every team member brings something different to the table, and we celebrate these differences as they lead to richer discussions, broader viewpoints, and better solutions. We are currently a team of seven purchasers with different backgrounds, experiences, and competences. The team is characterized by openness, inclusion, and a supportive way of working. A helping hand is always provided and appreciated between team members. That said, we would like you to join us on Scania's extraordinary journey into a sustainable transport solution.
   

  

  

* Goal-Orientation and Self-Drive


 Our team values goal-orientation and self-drive, seeing them as key elements for personal growth and organizational success. We believe that a strong sense of purpose and a drive to achieve are instrumental in meeting objectives, overcoming challenges, and pushing boundaries. As a Sourcing Manager, you'll have the chance to set your goals, work towards them at your pace, and revel in the satisfaction that comes with each accomplishment.
   

  

  

* Positive Energy


 Positive energy is contagious — it fosters enthusiasm, boosts morale, and encourages cooperation. In our organization, we value individuals who can infuse positivity into their work, even in the face of challenges. Positivity helps us to persevere, remain focused on our goals, and maintain a productive work environment. Your positive attitude can influence your colleagues, suppliers, and customers, thereby enhancing relationships and improving business outcomes.
   

  

**Your profile**
 A Master's degree is highly desirable for this role. With such qualifications, you'll be equipped with the technical knowledge needed to understand the R&D as well as the suppliers. Additionally, you'll have a grasp on business principles that will help you make the right decisions. That said, we also recognize equivalent experience and are open to candidates who can demonstrate the necessary skills and knowledge, even if they come from a different educational background.
   

  

 Our ideal candidate is someone who has a genuine interest in commerce and a passion for doing business. This passion fuels curiosity, initiative, and persistence — all crucial qualities for success in the role of a Sourcing Manager. A strong commercial interest will enable you to stay updated on market trends, understand supplier strategies, and negotiate contracts effectively. It's this passion that can transform routine purchasing tasks into strategic business activities.
   

  

 As a Sourcing Manager, clear, professional, and persuasive communication is paramount. Whether you're liaising with suppliers, collaborating with colleagues, or reporting to management, your ability to communicate effectively will significantly impact your success. You'll need to be persuasive when negotiating deals, clear when conveying information, and professional at all times. These communication skills will not only aid in your daily tasks but also help build and maintain strong relationships with suppliers and stakeholders. Fluency in English is a must for this role, as it's the primary language of our international business operations. However, proficiency in Swedish and/or German is a plus.
   

  

**Me as a Manager**
 As a manager, I know that people are our greatest assets and my main task is to develop you even further. I get motivated by supporting and developing each individual as well as the team so that the team becomes greater than the sum of its members.
   

  

**For more information**
 If you believe you have what it takes to excel as a Sourcing Manager for Project Purchasing Hoses, I would love to hear from you. Consider this not just a job, but an opportunity to grow, learn, and make a real impact. Please contact Marcus Niclasson, Manager Project Purchasing Exterior, +46 8 553 826 98.
   

  

**Application**
 Don't wait — take the leap, apply now, and let's achieve great things together! It is a great first role to be part of a purchasing organization and developing towards a Sourcing Manager career.
   

  

 Apply on our website and your application should include a CV, a cover letter, and copies of any relevant certificates (e.g. university degrees).
   

  

 Please apply as soon as possible and no later than 19th of January 2025.
   

  

 Selection, interviews and tests will take place continuously during the recruitment process. For your information, we may perform a background check for this position.
   

  

 We look forward to receiving your application!
   

  

 \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_
   

  

**Sourcing Manager för projektinköp av slangar och gummi**
 Scania genomgår nu en omvandling från att vara en leverantör av lastbilar, bussar och motorer till att bli en leverantör av kompletta och hållbara transportlösningar.
   

  

 Är du passionerad för affärer, med en känsla för teknik och ingenjörskonst? Är du en initiativrik person som trivs i en positiv miljö? Om så är fallet, vill vi ha dig i vårt team. Vi söker en entusiastisk och målinriktad person för att fylla rollen som Sourcing Manager.
   

  

**Översikt över positionen**
 Vi är specialiserade på upphandling av alla slangar inom utvecklingsprojekt för hela TRATON-gruppen. Du kommer att stödja teamet av projektinköpare med olika uppgifter, såsom att skicka förfrågningar om offerter, förhandla, lägga beställningar, skicka PPAP-förfrågningar och hantera produktändringar. Detta gör att du kan vara i framkant av alla pågående projekt och innovationer som kommer att forma vår framtid – hållbara transportlösningar.
   

  

**Varför ansluta till vårt team?**
* Positiv och öppen kultur


 Vi tror på att främja en positiv och öppen kultur inom vår organisation. Detta skapar inte bara en trevlig arbetsmiljö, utan främjar också kreativitet, uppmuntrar problemlösning och driver innovation. Att vara en del av vårt team innebär att du kommer att värderas och respekteras för ditt unika perspektiv och dina bidrag. Vi förstår att varje teammedlem bidrar med något annorlunda, och vi uppskattar dessa skillnader eftersom de leder till rikare diskussioner, bredare synpunkter och bättre lösningar. Vi är för närvarande ett team på sju inköpare med olika bakgrunder, erfarenheter och kompetenser. Teamet kännetecknas av öppenhet, inkludering och ett stödjande arbetssätt. En hjälpande hand ges alltid och uppskattas mellan teammedlemmar. Med det sagt, skulle vi vilja att du följer med oss på Scanias extraordinära resa mot en hållbar transportlösning.
   

  

  

* Målinriktning och självdriv


 Vårt team värderar målinriktning och självdriv och ser det som nyckelelement för personlig tillväxt och organisatorisk framgång. Vi tror att ett syfte och en drivkraft för att uppnå målen är avgörande för att nå önskat resultat, övervinna utmaningar och tänja på gränserna. Som Sourcing Manager kommer du att ha chansen att sätta dina mål, arbeta mot dem i din egen takt och njuta av tillfredsställelsen som kommer med varje prestation.
   

  

  

* Positiv energi


 Positiv energi är smittsam – den främjar entusiasm, höjer moralen och uppmuntrar samarbete. I vår organisation värderar vi individer som kan tillföra positivitet i sitt arbete, även i möten med utmaningar. Positivitet hjälper oss att hålla ut, förbli fokuserade på våra mål och upprätthålla en produktiv arbetsmiljö. Din positiva attityd kan påverka dina kollegor, leverantörer och kunder, vilket förbättrar relationer och affärsresultat.
   

  

**Din profil**
 En masterexamen är mycket önskvärt för denna roll, med sådana kvalifikationer kommer du att vara utrustad med den tekniska kunskap som behövs för att förstå R&D samt leverantörerna. Dessutom kommer du att ha en förståelse för affärsprinciper som hjälper dig att fatta rätt beslut. Med det sagt, accepterar vi också motsvarande erfarenhet och är öppna för kandidater som kan visa de nödvändiga färdigheterna och kunskaperna, även om de kommer från en annan utbildningsbakgrund.
   

  

 Vår idealkandidat är någon som har ett genuint intresse för handel och en passion för att göra affärer. Denna passion driver nyfikenhet, initiativ och uthållighet – alla viktiga egenskaper för framgång i rollen som inköpschef. Ett starkt kommersiellt intresse gör att du kan hålla dig uppdaterad om marknadstrender, förstå leverantörsstrategier och förhandla kontrakt effektivt. Det är denna passion som kan förvandla rutinmässiga inköpsuppgifter till strategiska affärsaktiviteter.
   

  

 Som Sourcing Manager är tydlig, professionell och övertygande kommunikation avgörande oavsett om du samarbetar med leverantörer, samarbetar med kollegor eller rapporterar till ledningen, kommer din förmåga att kommunicera effektivt påverka din framgång avsevärt. Du måste vara övertygande när du förhandlar affärer, tydlig när du förmedlar information och professionell hela tiden. Dessa kommunikationsfärdigheter kommer inte bara att hjälpa dig i dina dagliga uppgifter utan också hjälpa till att bygga och upprätthålla starka relationer med leverantörer och intressenter. Flytande engelska är ett måste för denna roll, eftersom det är det primära språket för våra internationella affärsoperationer. Dock är kunskaper i svenska och/eller tyska ett plus.
   

  

**Jag som chef**
 Som chef vet jag att människor är vår största tillgång och min huvuduppgift är att utveckla dig för att nå din fulla potential som Sourcing Manager. Jag blir motiverad av att stödja och utveckla varje individ samt teamet så att teamet blir större än summan av dess medlemmar.
   

  

**För mer information**
 Om du tror att du har vad som krävs för att lyckas som Sourcing Manager för projektinköp av slangar och gummi, skulle jag gärna höra från dig. Se detta inte bara som ett jobb, utan som en möjlighet att växa, lära och göra en verklig skillnad. Vänligen kontakta Marcus Niclasson, Manager Project Purchasing Exterior, +46 8 553 826 98.
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Vänta inte – ta steget, ansök nu och låt oss uppnå stora saker tillsammans! Det är en bra första roll att vara en del av en inköpsorganisation och utvecklas mot en karriär som inköpschef.
   

  

 Ansök på vår webbplats och din ansökan bör innehålla ett CV, ett personligt brev och kopior av relevanta certifikat (t.ex. universitetsgrader).
   

  

 Vänligen ansök så snart som möjligt och senast den 19 januari 2025.
   

  

 Urval, intervjuer och tester kommer att ske löpande under rekryteringsprocessen. För din information kan vi utföra en bakgrundskontroll för denna position.
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att få din ansökan!

title: Network Engineer to Support Industrial Services!
description:
Are you passionate about network engineering and looking for an exciting opportunity to make a significant impact? The Scania IT IUBC ILAN team is seeking two experienced network engineers to join us in delivering top-notch network expertise to Scania Production entities, primarily in Södertälje.
   

  

**About Us**
 At Scania IT IUBC ILAN, we bridge the gap between OT and IT environments, ensuring seamless network connectivity and know-how across the enterprise. Our responsibilities range from architecture and design to daily operations. We work closely with security functions, technical teams, and stakeholders, participating in relevant business and IT forums. Our environment primarily consists of Cisco LAN and WLAN, with Firewalls, Proxy, and DDI solutions from various vendors.
   

  

**Your Role**
 As a key member of our team, you will:
   

  

  

* Configure, implement, and manage network infrastructure solutions to ensure high availability, reliability, and scalability.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and develop solutions that meet business needs.
* Conduct wireless surveys and analyses.
* Monitor and analyze network performance and connectivity.
* Troubleshoot network problems and implement solutions to optimize and automate processes.
* Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices.
* Provide technical support and expertise to resolve complex network issues and demands.


**Your Profile**
 We are looking for candidates who have:
   

  

  

* A relevant academic education or equivalent work experience in the field.
* Strong documentation skills and proficiency in both verbal and written communication.
* Fluency in English, as it is our main working language.
* A proactive, structured, and customer-oriented mindset.
* The ability to take initiative and ownership, with a drive to follow through on activities to achieve results.
* A deep understanding of network and network security technologies.
* A proven track record of successfully implementing and maintaining network solutions in large manufacturing enterprises.


 Hands-on experience in both OT and IT network areas is highly desirable
   

  

**Why join us?**
* Be part of a dynamic team that values collaboration and innovation.
* Work in a global environment with opportunities for professional growth.
* Contribute to impactful projects that enhance Scania's digital presence and customer engagement.


 If you are ready to take on this exciting challenge and make a difference don’t hesitate to apply.
   

  

 We are interviewing continuously.
   

  

**For more information**
 Please contact recruiting manager Tryggve Rehn: Tryggve.Rehn@scania.com
   

  

 A background check might be conducted for this position

title: Nätverkstekniker
description:
Har du erfarenhet inom nätverk och infrastruktur och är redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär? Hos Amendo Tech får du möjligheten att arbeta med ledande företag inom bank, finans, retail, myndigheter, produktbolag och innovativa startups. Vi söker just nu engagerade konsulter för kommande interimsuppdrag som kan stärka våra kunders tekniska landskap och säkerställa deras infrastruktur och nätverk på högsta nivå.
   

  

 Din kompetens & profil
   

  

 Vi söker dig som är kunnig inom nätverksarkitektur och säkerhet och som har erfarenhet av att designa, implementera och övervaka nätverkslösningar i komplexa miljöer. Du har arbetat med några av följande tekniker:
   

  

* Nätverksprotokoll och teknik: Stark kompetens inom TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, VLAN, VPN och routingprotokoll (t.ex. OSPF, BGP).
* Brandväggar och säkerhet: Erfarenhet av brandväggar, IDS/IPS, och andra säkerhetslösningar, exempelvis Cisco ASA, Palo Alto eller Fortinet.
* Trådlösa nätverk: Erfarenhet av att konfigurera och hantera trådlösa nätverk (WLAN) och Wi-Fi-lösningar.
* Lastbalansering och redundans: Kunskap om lastbalanserare och failover-lösningar för att säkerställa hög tillgänglighet.
* Nätverksövervakning och felsökning: Vana vid att använda övervakningsverktyg.
* Certifieringar: Gärna certifieringar inom Cisco (t.ex. CCNA, CCNP) eller motsvarande erfarenhet.
* Molnplattformar: Gedigen erfarenhet av AWS, Azure, eller Google Cloud Platform samt arbete med hybridmoln-arkitektur.
* Virtuella miljöer: Erfarenhet av virtualiseringsteknologier som VMware, Hyper-V eller KVM.
* Serveradministration: Kompetens inom Windows- och Linux-servrar, inklusive säkerhetspatchning och hantering av Active Directory.
* Lagring och backup: Kunskap om SAN, NAS och backuplösningar som Veeam eller Commvault.
* Automatisering och scripting: Förmåga att effektivisera och automatisera arbetsflöden med hjälp av PowerShell, Python eller Ansible.
* Säkerhet och övervakning: Förståelse för säkerhetspraxis och vana vid övervakningsverktyg för driftssäkerhet, exempelvis Zabbix eller Splunk.


 Du har en vilja, nyfikenhet och drivkraft att vilja skapa nytta hos kunden samt lära dig nytt. En problemlösare som inte är rädd för att ta initiativ och vågar utforska nya vägar och arbetssätt. Du har en förmåga att snabbt sätta dig in i nya sammanhang och processer. Du får saker gjorda och ser kunskapsluckor som en möjlighet för personlig utveckling. Du är analytisk och har stor förståelse för vikten av service och kommunikation.
   

  

 Som konsult kommer du att ställas inför en rad olika utmaningar, både från ett socialt och pragmatiskt perspektiv. Därför tror vi att du är öppen och ödmjuk för både förändring och för olikheter. Du har ett agilt sätt att möta problem och kan se dem från olika vinklar.
   

  

 Om Amendo Tech
   

  

 Amendo Tech är din heltäckande partner inom IT och tech. Som vår konsultkollega blir du en del av ett personligt bolag som lägger stor vikt vid kompetens, mångfald och innovation. Vi ser varje medarbetares unika perspektiv som en styrka, och vi erbjuder ett öppet klimat där vi stöttar dig att nå dina mål. Tillsammans bidrar vi till att forma en bättre framtid genom teknik och kreativitet.
   

  

 Vi är ett expansivt bolag med stark lokal närvaro i Stockholm samt i sydvästra och norra Sverige. Följ Amendo Tech på Linkedin!
   

  

 Amendo Tech är en del av Amendo Group som har arbetat med framtidens kompetens sedan 2001. I koncernen ingår även Amendo Bemanning & Rekrytering och Lagotto Executive Search & Interim. Tillsammans möter vi dig där du står, och tar dig dit du vill. Vi är din engagerade och trygga kompetenspartner.
   

  

 Frågor och kontakt
   

  

 Vid frågor eller funderingar om våra konsultuppdrag är du varmt välkommen att höra av dig till Amendo Techs Kiara Bergqvist på kiara.bergqvist@amendotech.se eller Johanna Hallenberg på johanna.hallenberg@amendotech.se. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig, varmt välkommen med din ansökan!

title: Data Governance Engineer, Solna or Copenhagen
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
We seek to strengthen our position and increase the speed of our digital transformation, and we are looking for you who will play an important role in identifying and implementing top notch data governance throughout the company. Analytics Center of Excellence is responsible for establishing the future IT landscape that will be the foundation for our data driven journey. PostNord is the leader of logistics and postal services in the Nordics and as a part of the IT organization, we support a variety of different PostNord stakeholders in a multitude of areas using our Azure-based Data Platform as our base. It is our goal to create scalable solutions to support the development of valuable data solutions and address broad range of use cases from logistics operations, self-service reporting and advanced analytics for companywide innovation and transformation initiatives.
   

  

**Job Duties**
 As a Data Governance Engineer, you are the IT representative responsible for the governance and safeguarding of our valuable data assets. You'll be a part of our Analytics Centre of Excellence and the main stakeholder for governance tools and procedures, as well as representing data owners’ perspective on the data assets to the data architect and the different teams delivering the platform and analytics solutions.
   

  

 In this role, you'll have the opportunity to work on a wide range of projects and initiatives and get to know data and business representatives from all over the company. This is a new role at PostNord and your first task will be to set up structured processes and channels that ensure data ownership within the organization, by assigning and leading data stewards from the business side in working on prioritized data governance tasks.
   

  

**Key responsibilities:**
* Policy and Framework Implementation: Secure implementation, and maintenance of data governance policies, standards, and procedures. Establish and enforce data usage guidelines and ensure compliance with regulations.
* Data Quality Management: Create and monitor data quality metrics, including accuracy, completeness, and consistency. Collaborate with stakeholders to identify and resolve data quality issues.
* Metadata Management: Design, implement and maintain process framework to secure that relevant metadata is captured, stored and maintained in data dictionaries and catalogues. Ensure proper documentation of data sources, ownership, and lineage.
* Compliance and Risk Management: Ensure internal organizational compliance with data privacy and protection laws (e.g., GDPR). Identify and mitigate risks related to data security and integrity.
* Access Control and Security: Implement role-based access controls to secure sensitive data. Collaborate with IT and security teams to enforce data protection measures.
* Stakeholder Collaboration: Work with data stewards, business teams, and IT to define data ownership and accountability. Provide guidance and training on data governance best practices to stakeholders.
* Data Governance Tools and Technology: Develop strong expertise of the Microsoft Purview and drive its implementation on the enterprise level. Ensure that all available capabilities are utilized in the most effective way to satisfy PostNord requirements, for example automation of governance processes, such as data quality checks and reporting.
* Audit and Documentation: Maintain accurate records of data policies, governance processes, and system configurations.


 The tech stack still varies from team to team, but for data platform we are mainly focused on the Azure stack, (among the services used are Azure Auto ML, Azure ML Ops, Data Bricks, Data Factory, Synapse, Azure DevOps CI/CD, and Power BI etc). Our RPA team primarily work with UIPath and the Microsoft Power Platform. For governance, our preferred tool is Microsoft Purview.
   

  

 We prefer to use Agile, and our unit applies a pragmatic approach to SAFe to resolve dependencies and set the pace for development, but we choose the appropriate approach for the product and team.
   

  

**Your profile**
 You are either a technical person that thrives in the domain of processes and policies, or you have a background in organizational development but with a curiosity in data and analytics.
   

  

 It is important that you are comfortable to work closely with a multitude of stakeholders, ranging from tech geeks to strategy yuppies. You are result-oriented enough to not only identify what needs to be done within your area of responsibility, but also to be hands-on in executing the roadmap towards the target state.
   

  

**Requirements**
 We are seeking an individual with the potential for growth within the role. We don’t have a long list of specific requirements, but expect you to have:
   

  

* Proven track record of organizational development, project management, team leadership or similar experience in a context requiring change management
* Cloud literacy, and understanding of how modern IT solutions create business value
* Knowledge of, or curiosity in databases, data warehousing, big data platforms and data visualization tools


**Meriting**
* A relation to and clear opinion about agile philosophy and servant leadership
* Experience in data management or data governance


 We accept applications from all of EU but would require a remote colleague to be willing to work on site on a regular basis.
   

  

**We offer you**
* Work in a Nordic and dynamic environment.
* Wellness allowance & access to the office´s gym and health center.
* Employee benefits through PostNord’s own personnel foundation PostNord Plus.
* Great occupational pension terms.
* Great development opportunities and a continuous learning culture.
* Employment in Stockholm or Copenhagen.


**We make everyday life easier**
 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region.
   

  

 We are accountable, brave and committed, effectively leading change regardless if we lead our self or others. We emphasize teamwork, sincerity and positive relationships in the workplace. We build on our success and learn from both colleagues and mistakes. People with different backgrounds work with us. You will therefore be part of a workplace with great diversity, which contributes to better results for the business. Visit us at postnord.com
   

  

**Apply**
 Don't wait to submit your application as we go through the applications on an ongoing basis. If you have any questions or concerns, you are welcome to contact Pernille Skovborg on pernille.skovborg@postnord.com.
   

  

 We are looking forward to hear from you!
   

  

 For union representatives, visit: www.postnord.com/fackliga

title: Analytiker
job_function: General Business, Human Resources, and Consulting
description:
**Aon Rewards Solutions söker en kundorienterad analytiker**
 Aon Rewards Solutions erbjuder konsult- och outsourcingtjänster inom HR-området med fokus på att utveckla och säkra företagens viktigaste tillgång - medarbetarna. Vi är en del av Aon med totalt 200 anställda i Sverige, globalt är vi runt 69 000 anställda. Vi finns på Stadion i Stockholm och har kontor även i Göteborg och Malmö.
   

  

 Våra verktyg för arbetsvärdering, löneanalyser, lönekartläggning och lönestatistik/marknadslöneinformation är väletablerade och är starkast på den svenska marknaden. Vår kundbas är bred och omfattar både privata och offentliga företag.
   

  

**Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter**
 Du kommer att arbeta med lokala kunder i Sverige inom ett globalt team. Arbetsuppgifterna inkluderar att samla in och bearbeta lönedata, skapa databaser, producera rapporter och ge support för våra kunder kring vår hemsida och inrapporteringsfrågor. Du kommer också att förklara våra tjänster och uppmuntra deltagande i undersökningar.
   

  

 Ett annat viktigt inslag i arbetet är att hjälpa våra kunder att tolka statistik och att använda våra olika IT-verktyg för till exempel statistiska analyser, arbetsvärdering, rapportering av marknadslöneinformation med mera. Du kommer också att arbeta nära våra konsulter och delta i utvecklingen av nya IT-verktyg och statistiktjänster.
   

  

 I denna roll har du möjlighet att påverka och utveckla interna processer och våra verktyg.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker dig som är en skicklig, serviceinriktad och drivande analytiker med goda kunskaper i Excel. Vi ser att du som söker har en avslutad högskole-/universitetsutbildning inom statistik och/eller ekonomi, men du kan även ha en HR-bakgrund kombinerat med intresse och kunskap inom statistik och en vana att använda IT i ditt arbete.
   

  

 Meriterande om du har 1-2 års relevant yrkeserfarenhet, men detta är inget krav. I din roll kommer du även ha internationella kontakter varför det är av vikt att du har en god kommunikationsförmåga på både svenska och engelska.
   

  

 Du Är En Stark Lagspelare Med God Samarbets- Och Kommunikationsförmåga. Dessutom Är Du Van Vid Att Skapa Databaser, Analysera Data Och Kunna Förklara Statistiken På Ett Meningsfullt Sätt. Utöver Detta Ser Vi Gärna Att Du Har Följande
   

  

* Erfarenhet av SAS eller liknande programmeringsbakgrund
* Erfarenhet av eller akademisk kunskap om att använda ersättnings-/förmånsundersökningar
* Erfarenhet av dataanalys, undersökningar/enkätdata och rapportering
* Erfarenhet av att producera och presentera rapporter


 Våra värderingar bygger på teamwork, entreprenörskap och affärsmässighet och för oss är det viktigt att du delar vår kundfokuserade företagskultur.
   

  

**Intresserad? Ansök nu!**
 Skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt då urval sker löpande, senast 2024-01-12. Om du har frågor om rollen, vänligen kontakta Lauren Duff, Data Analytics Manager, Rewards Solutions lauren.duff@aon.se alternativt Amanda Hansson, HR 076 127 71 87.

title: Machine Learning Engineer & Data Engineer
description:
Drivs du av att arbeta med data och utveckla lösningar som gör verklig skillnad? Hos Amendo Tech får du chansen att arbeta i framkant inom machine learning och data engineering för några av Sveriges mest spännande företag. Just nu söker vi drivna och lösningsorienterade specialister för kommande uppdrag inom bank och finans, detaljhandel, myndigheter, produktbolag och snabbväxande startups. Vi erbjuder unika möjligheter för dig som är redo för en ny, stimulerande utmaning.

 Vi söker dig som har gedigen erfarenhet av att bygga och implementera maskininlärningsmodeller och som trivs med att analysera stora mängder data för att skapa insikter och affärsvärde.

* Prediktiv modellering: Erfarenhet av regression, klassificering, klustring och djupinlärning.
* Databehandling: Vana vid dataförbehandling och analys, gärna med verktyg som Pandas, NumPy och Dask.
* Molntjänster: Erfarenhet av ML-pipelines på AWS SageMaker, Azure ML eller Google Cloud AI.

* ETL/ELT-processer: Erfarenhet av att utveckla effektiva och robusta ETL/ELT-pipelines.
* Big Data-ramverk: Kunskap inom hantering och bearbetning av stora datamängder med exempelvis Hadoop, Hive, eller Snowflake.
* Versionshantering och samarbete: God förståelse för versionshantering i Git och vana att arbeta i agila team.
* Data Governance och säkerhet: Förståelse för datahanteringsprinciper, GDPR och dataetik.

title: Development Engineer, Commercial and Technical Specification
description:
The Group Modularisation plays an important role in Technical Product Planning. We engage in all stages of Scania´s development process, from identifying product portfolio gaps to providing technical analysis for new initiatives to describe the correct concept content how our Bygglåda looks like when opening the order book. As a team, we describe and secure the technical specifications for trucks and lead their development through collaborative UseCase work. Additionally, we provide technical recommendations for trucks and educate others in Scania Modularisation theory.
   

  

**Role and duties**
 We are looking for a Development Engineer to join our Technical and Commercial Specification team. Our team works with describing how all our initiatives and projects affect our Bygglåda. Technical Specification is widely used within the company. For instance, it defines the scope of our initiatives/projects, it is a base for product structure, it is input for presales, long-term planning capacity, and more. To manage the global Bygglåda within TRATON you will play an important role to describe additionally the commercial specification to define the brand specific outcome of the Bygglåda.
   

  

 We are still in a transformation process where we are going from describing our Bygglåda in documents to storing the information in a new digital tool for Technical Specification – DTS. You will be able to join and influence the final product that we strongly believe will be a game changer for Scania and TRATON long-term. Not only will we be able to keep track of our Bygglåda in one place but also be able to keep track of the connections in time for our initiatives and projects in a way we have never been able to before.
   

  

 This role is highly collaborative and involves coordinating the technical and commercial part with different projects, technical expertise (R&D), Sales & Marketing and other brands in the Traton Group.
   

  

**Your Qualities And Skills**
 You are committed, careful, responsible, and have analytical/logical thinking capacity. You can see the structure and grasp the whole picture but you are at the same time patient enough to work with the small details. Your ability to express yourself in writing, both in Swedish and English is good. Collaborative skills and the ability to coordinate the work and drive progress are other important qualities to succeed well in this role. As the questions you work with will cover several technical areas and different parts of the truck, you need experience from working within Scania R&D or comparable operations. Knowledge of the complete truck and usage of the truck is meritorious.
   

  

**Scania Offers**
 We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including Scania Sergel and Midway hubs. With a structured development plan and courses, Scania supports your career growth both locally and internationally.
   

  

 Benefits include training at our health center Gröndal or wellness allowance, result bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. Scania also hosts events for employees and their families, and Stockholm residents enjoy direct access to Södertälje via Scania Job express buses.
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.
   

  

 Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-01-10. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

 If you have questions or would like more information, please contact: Florian Roderfeld, florian.roderfeld@scania.com
   

  

**We look forward for your application!**

title: Projektledare med erfarenhet av Business Central (hybrid)
description:
Att arbeta på COSMO CONSULT är inte som på andra ställen.
   

  

 Upptäck COSMO CONSULT och möt den positiva stämningen hos våra COSMOnauter. Här skapar vi framtiden tillsammans – för människor och med människor. Vi utvecklas gemensamt och ser till att alla kan växa i sin roll.
   

  

 Hos oss får du arbeta i en miljö där respekt och trygghet är i fokus. Vi värdesätter flexibilitet och ger dig friheten att arbeta där och när det passar dig, samtidigt som vi uppmuntrar till innovation och nytänkande.
   

  

 Bli en del av vårt team och arbeta med en av världens ledande Microsoftpartners inom verksamhetstransformation och digitalisering.
   

  

 Projektledare med erfarenhet av Business Central
   

  

**Om tjänsten:**
* Variationsrik vardag med utvecklingsmöjligheter i både lokala och globala projekt.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med både korta (några månader) och långa projekt.
* Arbeta självständigt eller tillsammans med kollegor, med stöd av beprövade metoder och branschstandarder.
* Som projektledare ansvarar du för:
+ Planering, organisering och ledning av leveransteamet.
+ Skapande av projektplaner och fördelning av arbete.
+ Säkerställande av leverans enligt tidsplan, kvalitet och budget.

* Arbetar agilt och med vattenfallsmodellen, hanterar tidsplaner, riskanalyser, sprintplanering och scrummöten.
* Deltar i säljprocessen och identifierar affärsmöjligheter hos kunder.
* Arbetar på kontor men även ute hos kund – resor kan förekomma beroende på projekt.
* Möjlighet att delta i internationella projekt.


 Du har erfarenhet av:
   

  

 Vi söker dig som är en sann
 **lagspelare** 
 med stark vilja att dela med dig av din kunskap till andra. Vi tror på kompetensdelning i alla riktningar
   

  

 – tillsammans blir arbetet både roligare och mer effektivt! I övrigt så är du strukturerad och noggrann samt har en förmåga att driva dina åtaganden i mål.
   

  

 Du har
 **5 års kvalificerad erfarenhet** 
 från en roll som projektledare och är van att hantera flera projekt samtidigt. Du har erfarenhet både från vattenfalls- och agila projekt och organisationer samt bedrivit dem i
 **DevOps** 
 . Erfarenhet av
 **implementationer av affärssystem** 
 är meriterande.
   

  

 Ett krav är du har erfarenhet av Microsofts affärssystem BC (
 **Business Central** 
 ).
   

  

 Intresse för IT och systemlösningar och relevant utbildning från högskola eller universitet samt goda kunskaper i
 **svenska och engelska** 
 i både tal och skrift.
   

  

 Vi är också unika.
   

  

 Det är det som skiljer oss åt:
   

  

* Hos oss är alla en del av teamet - din röst behövs, även när det gäller vår egen företagsutveckling.
* Det är viktigt för oss att du känner dig uppskattad och stödd.
* Platsoberoende och flexibelt arbete är en självklarhet för oss. I rollen ingår det att kontinuerligt besöka något av våra kontor runt om i Sverige; Stockholm, Malmö och Göteborg.
* Internationellt samarbete är vardag för oss - upptäck andra kulturer och nya världar.
* En säker och positiv arbetsmiljö är vår högsta prioritet.
* Vi har omvandling i blodet - vi står inte stilla.
* Det ligger oss varmt om hjärtat att tillsammans med dig utforma din fortsatta utveckling.
* Hos oss är det möjligt att göra olika och ovanliga karriärer.
* Vi tar vårt ansvar för människor och miljö på allvar.


 Do you want to become part of the team?
   

  

 Apply directly online with your informative application documents and your earliest possible start date.
   

  

 Do you want more #insideCOSMO?

title: Sales Agent SE
company_industry: Financial Services and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
**Job Description**
**Why join us in 2025?**

The focus will be on new sales acquisition and cross/upselling.
   

  

 Your
 **key responsibilities** 
 in this role will be:
